actions.title: Request letter of support from Cross Cancer Institute
actions.description: Contact Dr. Michael Chiu to request CCI letter for CAR-T cell therapy partnership.

actions.title: Verify Michael Chiu's role and title
actions.description: Confirm Dr. Chiu's official title for inclusion in CFI proposal team section.

actions.title: Include evidence for the use of AI in trial development, implementation, and management
actions.description: Include evidence for the use of AI in trial development, implementation, and management - projects/cfi-ctap/ideas/research/ct-spending.md

notes.text: Added comprehensive AI evidence section with citations to systematic reviews (Chow 2023, Lu 2024, Saady 2025) and implementation studies (Beck 2020, Calaprice-Whitty 2020). Source TODO removed from MASTER.md.

actions.title: AI is but one Gap in the system - other gaps outlined in ct-gaps.md
actions.description: AI is but one Gap in the system - other gaps outlined in projects/cfi-ctap/ideas/research/ct-gaps.md

notes.text: Addressed in revised AI evidence section - fragmentation identified as dominant barrier, not AI performance. Source TODO removed from MASTER.md.

actions.title: Include the following three references
actions.description: include the following three references (Matthew Purri et al., 2025; J. Beck et al., 2020; F. Cascini et al., 2022)

notes.text: References integrated inline with citations: [@beck2020; @purri2025; @cascini2022]. Source TODO and explanatory notes removed from MASTER.md.

actions.title: Bridging argument for biobanks and their value in accelerating clinical trials
actions.description: We need a bridging argument for biobanks and there value in acclerating clinical trials. Why is biobanking relevant to rapid translation? see projects/cfi-ctap/ideas/research/why-biobanking.md

notes.text: Added new section 1.2 'The Role of Integrated Biobanking in Trial Acceleration' covering pre-screened cohorts, molecular stratification, platform trial enablement, passive follow-up, and CTAP-specific translation benefits. Source TODO removed from MASTER.md. Section numbering updated (1.3 Competitive Landscape, 1.4 Market Gap).

actions.title: Review ct-spending.md and update spending paragraph
actions.description: Review the ct-spending.md file and update and expand the next paragraph about Canadian clinical trial spending compared to Australia and UK.

notes.text: Updated MASTER.md with comparative spending data: Canada C$0.8-1.0B (~C$20-26/capita), Australia A$1.6B (~A$62/capita), UK £2.45B (~£36/capita). Removed TODO marker. Data sourced from ct-spending.md research file.

actions.title: Implement Unified Grant Metadata Architecture
actions.description: Create base 6-layer grant schema (scripts/models/grant.py), agency extension schemas (CFI, CIHR-CT, CIHR-Project), migrate cfi-ctap/config/context.yaml to split base + extension format, update skills to load context.yaml + *-config.yaml. See docs/plans/unified-project-metadata-architecture.md

actions.title: Create grant lifecycle commands (/grant-submit, /grant-decision, /grant-resubmit)
actions.description: Create commands for grant lifecycle management: /grant-submit (mark submitted, record date/status), /grant-decision (record funded/declined), /grant-resubmit (start resubmission cycle with version tracking). Part of unified grant architecture.

actions.title: Implement Action Items Management System
actions.description: Build full /actions command implementation: local storage (actions/actions.json), extraction from ideas/markdown TODOs/compliance/gdoc-comments, two-way Google Sheets sync, auto-update markdown checkboxes. See .claude/commands/actions.md for spec.

actions.title: Implement protocol import mode for /new-protocol
actions.description: Add --from flag to /new-protocol for importing existing protocol documents. Support sources: docx:<path>, gdoc:<id>, url:<url>, pdf:<path>. Implement 4-stage extraction with SPIRIT 2025 mapping, SOA table detection, interactive corrections. See .claude/commands/new-protocol.md

actions.title: Option A: Root folder naming convention migration
actions.description: Rename ~/writing_projects → ~/writing-projects and ~/mcp_servers → ~/mcp-servers. Update ~45 files with hardcoded paths including MCP configs, Python scripts, documentation. Prerequisites: confirm Option B stability, plan GitHub rename if applicable.

notes.text: Deferred - Option B (project folder rename) complete and stable. Option A deferred until needs warrant the disruption.

actions.title: HedgeDoc integration for collaborative markdown editing
actions.description: Create scripts/hedgedoc_sync.py, push/pull/status skills, bidirectional markdown sync with conflict resolution. Enables real-time collaborative editing while keeping local markdown as source of truth. See docs/plans/future-enhancements/hedgedoc-integration.md

actions.title: Update /new-project to add grant type with agency selection
actions.description: Modify .claude/commands/new-project.md and new_project.sh to support 'grant' project type. Add agency selection prompt (CFI, CIHR-CT, CIHR-Project). Generate appropriate templates based on agency. Part of unified grant architecture.

actions.title: Finalize Living Biorepository technical architecture with Suite 4 Data Platform team
actions.description: Coordinate with Suite 4 team to finalize the technical architecture for Living Biorepository integration including Zone 1/2/3 data flows, consent registry integration, and OMOP query capabilities.

actions.title: Implement real-time FHIR linkage to Connect Care via platform DSA
actions.description: Establish FHIR API integration with Connect Care for real-time specimen-to-EMR linkage. Requires DSA with AHS and coordination with Suite 4 TRE architecture.

actions.title: Deploy predictive inventory management algorithms
actions.description: Develop and deploy AI/ML algorithms for predictive biospecimen inventory management including sample depletion forecasting, optimal aliquoting strategies, and underutilized specimen identification.

actions.title: Establish cross-trial reuse governance framework with Data Access Committee
actions.description: Develop governance framework for cross-trial specimen reuse including consent categories, DAC review processes, and researcher discovery portal integration.

actions.title: Coordinate GMP cleanroom specifications for ACTM expansion
actions.description: Work with ACTM team to finalize GMP cleanroom specifications for expanded cell manufacturing capacity including bioreactor installation, cell washer requirements, and environmental monitoring.

actions.title: Develop consent-aware routing logic with participant portal (Suite 5)
actions.description: Implement consent-aware sample routing logic that integrates with Suite 5 participant engagement portal for dynamic consent updates and automated sample release decisions.

actions.title: Add MANTA and Precision Medicine Initiative details to Radiogenomic Integration section
actions.description: Expand Capability 5 (Radiogenomic Integration) in Suite 2 technical spec with details about MANTA system. Contact James White for information. Reference Calgary's Precision Medicine Initiative (https://libin.ucalgary.ca/initiatives/precision-medicine-initiative).
